alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 3:59PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander and northwestern Eureka Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 359 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Crescent Valley, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Tenabo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
